web_snippets: Mark Wukas has spent his life in Chicago working as professional asker of questions as both a teacher and writer–and sometimes both at the same time.
Mark Wukas, former School Teacher and Journalist. ... Beowulf certainly is a product of his times—a great warrior who seeks ...
Mark Wukas is a retired high school English teacher who spent two decades as a journalist and professional writer before taking to the classroom.
